ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Hell, where they will roast? What an evil place to stay!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Hell, where they will roast in the fire? And what an evil repository!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Hell, wherein they shall roast? How wretched a place to settle in!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will suffer in Hell. What a terrible place to stay!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Which is hell; they will enter it; and what a wretched place of stay!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Hell, in which they will burn, - and what an evil place to settle in!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Into j hell? They shall enter into it and an evil place it is to settle in.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Gehenna, wherein they are roasted; an evil stablishment!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Even to) hell? They are exposed thereto. A hapless end!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In Hell shall they burn; an evil place to stay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hell, wherein they shall roast. How ill is the settlement!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —hell, which they shall enter, and it is an evil abode!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Into Hell? They will burn therein,- an evil place to stay in!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Hell, in which they will burn, - and what an evil place to settle in!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They shall be roasted in Gehenna; an evil establishment!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Hell—they will roast in it. What a miserable settlement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It is] Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the settlement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:29] Hell (jahannama: a supplement, functioning as an explicative): to which they shall be exposed, admitted — an evil place to settle!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then said: ((Even to) hell? They are exposed thereto) they will enter it on the Day of Judgement. (A hapless end!) their abode and destination is Gehenna.
